8. Probabilitc Reasoning (2)

Approximate Inference (ê·¼ì‚¬ ì¶”ë¡ )

  • ëŒ€ê·œëª¨ ë² ì´ì¦ˆ ë„· (Bayesian networks)ì— ëŒ€í•œ ì •í™•í•œ ì¶”ë¡  (Exact Inference)ì˜ ë³µì¡ë„ O(2n)O(2^n)O(2n) ë¬¸ì œë¥¼ í•´ê²°í•˜ê¸° ìœ„í•œ Solution: ë¬´ì‘ìœ„ ìƒ˜í”Œë§ ì•Œê³ ë¦¬ì¦˜ (Randomized Sampling Algorithms) ë˜ëŠ” Monte Carlo algorithms

Rejection Sampling (ê¸°ê° ìƒ˜í”Œë§)

  • ìƒ˜í”Œë§í•˜ê¸° ì–´ë ¤ìš´ ë¶„í¬ì—ì„œ ìƒ˜í”Œì„ ìƒì„±í•˜ê¸° ìœ„í•œ ì¼ë°˜ì ì¸ ë°©ë²•. ì‰¬ìš´ ìƒ˜í”Œë§ ë¶„í¬ê°€ ì£¼ì–´ì¡Œì„ ë•Œ ì‚¬ìš©

Definition of Bayesian Network

  • ë°©í–¥ ê·¸ë˜í”„ (Directed graph)
  • ê° ë…¸ë“œ (Node)ëŠ” í™•ë¥  ë³€ìˆ˜ (Random Variable)ë¥¼ ë‚˜íƒ€ëƒ„

  • ê° ë…¸ë“œ XXXëŠ” ì¡°ê±´ë¶€ í™•ë¥  ë¶„í¬ P(Xâˆ£Parents(X))\mathbf{P}(X|\text{Parents}(X))P(Xâˆ£Parents(X))ë¥¼ ê°€ì§

An Appointment Example (ì•½ì† ì˜ˆì‹œ)

  • ë³€ìˆ˜:
  • Rain ({none, light, heavy})
  • Maintenance ({yes, no})
  • Train ({on time, delayed})
  • Appointment ({attend, miss})

Conditional Probability Tables (CPTs)

  • Rain: P(Rain)P(\text{Rain})P(Rain)
  • Maintenance: P(Maintenanceâˆ£Rain)P(\text{Maintenance}|\text{Rain})P(Maintenanceâˆ£Rain)
  • Train: P(Trainâˆ£Rain,Â Maintenance)P(\text{Train}|\text{Rain, Maintenance})P(Trainâˆ£Rain,Â Maintenance)
  • Appointment: P(Appointmentâˆ£Train)P(\text{Appointment}|\text{Train})P(Appointmentâˆ£Train)

Computing Joint Probabilities (ê²°í•© í™•ë¥  ê³„ì‚°)

  • P(light,Â no,Â delayed,Â miss)=P(light)P(noâˆ£light)P(delayedâˆ£light,Â no)P(missâˆ£delayed)P(\text{light, no, delayed, miss}) = P(\text{light}) P(\text{no}|\text{light}) P(\text{delayed}|\text{light, no}) P(\text{miss}|\text{delayed})P(light,Â no,Â delayed,Â miss)=P(light)P(noâˆ£light)P(delayedâˆ£light,Â no)P(missâˆ£delayed)

Probabilistic Inference

  • Query XXX: ë¶„í¬ë¥¼ ê³„ì‚°í•  ë³€ìˆ˜

  • Goal: P(Xâˆ£e)P(X|e)P(Xâˆ£e) ê³„ì‚°

Inference by Enumeration (Exact Inference)

  • ì˜ˆì‹œ: P(Appointmentâˆ£light,Â no)P(\text{Appointment}|\text{light, no})P(Appointmentâˆ£light,Â no)

    P(Appointmentâˆ£light,Â no)=Î±P(Appointment,Â light,Â no)P(\text{Appointment}|\text{light, no}) = \alpha P(\text{Appointment, light, no}) P(Appointmentâˆ£light,Â no)=Î±P(Appointment,Â light,Â no)

    =Î±[P(Appointment,Â light,Â no,Â onÂ time)+P(Appointment,Â light,Â no,Â delayed)]= \alpha [P(\text{Appointment, light, no, on time}) + P(\text{Appointment, light, no, delayed})] =Î±[P(Appointment,Â light,Â no,Â onÂ time)+P(Appointment,Â light,Â no,Â delayed)]

  • P(Xâˆ£e)=Î±P(X,e)=Î±âˆ‘yP(X,e,y)\mathbf{P}(X|e) = \alpha \mathbf{P}(X, e) = \alpha \sum_{y} \mathbf{P}(X, e, y)P(Xâˆ£e)=Î±P(X,e)=Î±âˆ‘yâ€‹P(X,e,y)

Approximate Inference: Sampling

  • ë² ì´ì¦ˆ ë„· (Bayesian Network)ì˜ í† í´ë¡œì§€ ìˆœì„œì— ë”°ë¼ ê° ë³€ìˆ˜ë¥¼ ìƒ˜í”Œë§í•˜ì—¬ ì™„ì „í•œ ìƒ˜í”Œ âŸ¨R=r,M=m,T=t,A=aâŸ©\langle R=r, M=m, T=t, A=a \rangleâŸ¨R=r,M=m,T=t,A=aâŸ©ì„ ìƒì„±
  • P(Train=onÂ time)P(\text{Train} = \text{on time})P(Train=onÂ time)ì™€ ê°™ì€ í™•ë¥ ì€ ìƒì„±ëœ ìƒ˜í”Œ ì¤‘ í•´ë‹¹ ì´ë²¤íŠ¸ê°€ ë°œìƒí•œ ë¹„ìœ¨ë¡œ ì¶”ì •
